snippet: The fantasy of competing against the best golfers in the world will become a reality at the British Open for John Singleton, a mild-mannered man with a blue-collar job.
abstract: John Singleton is the Walter Mitty of golf, mild-mannered man with a blue-collar job whose fantasy of competing against the best players in the world will become a reality when he participates in the 143rd British Open.
lead_paragraph: The fantasy of competing against the best golfers in the world will become a reality at the British Open for John Singleton, a mild-mannered man with a blue-collar job.

headline.seo: British Open 2014: John Singleton Lives His Fantasy as Golf’s Walter Mitty
headline.main: Once a British Open Fan From the Neighborhood, Now a Participant
headline.print_headline: Once a British Open Fan From the Neighborhood, Now a Participant
